meta-review.comment: Dead Island 2 is like a zombie piñata party - gory, messy, and just plain fun. Dambuster Studios managed to elevate the franchise with a highly entertaining cavalcade of carnage that will leave players gleefully hacking and slashing their way through hordes of undead. Sure, it's not without its technical hiccups, but when you're too busy enjoying the creative, scary fun of mowing down zombies, those issues fade into the background. With an abundance of weapons, anatomically correct zombies, and a healthy dose of social satire, Dead Island 2 delivers a refreshingly wild and satisfying zombie-slaying experience. It's not the deepest swimming pool in Bel Air, but who cares when you're having this much fun?
